description:
A set of accessories that will come in handy when your foes use troublesome status ailments.

Silver Chain x 1
Coral Bracelet x 1
Marble Bracelet x 1
Luminous Glasses x 1
Energy Bandanna x 1
Cooling Belt x 1
Cozy Socks x 1
Soft Stole x 1

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
name: Trails of Cold Steel III: Useful Accessories Set
